overview: Sabangji, who was born with both sexes from the body of a vicious criminal and a mad woman, grows up in Mireuksa Temple with the help of Sijuseung. The blue widow Lee So-sa and Sabangji, who came to her husband's Tal-sang rite, come down to the inner world by a fateful encounter and share a spiritual love that goes beyond the dimension of carnal desire.However, their love is discovered by the elders of the family, and So-sa betray everywhere The shaman who escaped...
title: Sabangji
